infos.value: Thanks for the send-off. This is as far as you go.
What are you talking about? I'm coming with you, of course.
Not happening.
You say that, but it's not like you can stop me. Besides, I'm not going to be separated from my big brother.
Salire... This is a mission, not a game.
That's why I'm going, too! You know how talented I am, don't you, Brother?
W-well, yes, I'll admit that, but...
Then it's decided!
So...are you going to do it?
Do it? Do what?
Save Mont, of course! What else would I mean?
Are you suggesting that we side with Leonis?
Well, Lady Mach√©rie is in love with Mont, right? It was written all over her face!
Yeah, she does seem smitten. But alas, we are Hourne, and so we are allied to Fennes.
Aww... So, we're going to fight Leonis?
Not necessarily. Our mission is to retrieve the ancient relic.
But if anyone gets in my way...then I'll just have to take them out.
So if that someone who gets in your way just happens to be Muraga...?
You really, really don't like Muraga, do you?
Nor do you, right, Brother?
Unfortunately, I don't think King Robb would approve.
Perhaps I will sabotage the pursuit. Deal him a serious wound or two.
But...but...would that really be enough?
There'll come a time for us to settle our grievances with Muraga once and for all. That day is not today.
Got that? You can only come if you promise you won't go on a rampage.
Ugh. Fine. Whatever you say.
